IndexPage.description: This is a basic example demonstrating the use of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top-right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: Secretimmo

PathnamesPage.description:
Paths are also internationalized.

If you use the default language, English, you will see /en/pathnames in the browser's address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL will be localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Paths

Error.description:
Unfortunately, we encountered an error.

You can try reloading the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

NotFoundPage.description: Please check the address in the navigation bar or use the menu to access a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found

Form.title: Rental Application Form
Form.desc: In accordance with the GDPR and Luxembourg laws on data protection and non-discrimination
Form.second_desc_1: The data collected in this form is limited to the strictly necessary elements for the evaluation of your rental application.
Form.second_desc_2: No information related to race, ethnic origin, religion, political views, sexual orientation, health, pregnancy, or marital status will be asked or used.
Form.conformite_legale_2: the *Law of August 1, 2018* on the protection of individuals with regard to data processing
Form.conformite_legale_3: the *Amended Law of November 28, 2006* on equal treatment
Form.step3_title: Household Composition Expected in the Property
Form.menu3_title: Household Composition Expected in the Property
Form.rental_guarantee_label: Rental guarantee or unpaid rent insurance available
Form.documents_required_desc: Please attach the following documents for each adult:
Form.document_requirement_2: Any other document confirming financial stability
Form.document_note: Without these documents, the application cannot be processed.
Form.previous_rental_issues_label: Previous payment delays or rental disputes
Form.data_consent_description: I declare that I have read and understood the data protection notice.
Form.data_consent_description2: I consent to my data being used solely for the rental selection process in accordance with:
Form.data_consent_rgpd: Article 6 (1) a) and b) of the GDPR
Form.data_consent_law_1: Law of 1 August 2018 on personal data protection
Form.data_consent_law_2: Amended law of 28 November 2006 on equal treatment
Form.data_consent_checkbox_label: I agree that my data will be used exclusively for the rental selection procedure
Form.data_consent_duration: Maximum retention period: 3 months or until the withdrawal of my consent.
Form.data_consent_required_error: You must accept the processing of your personal data
Form.data_consent_title: I may withdraw my consent or request data deletion at any time.
Form.housing_heberge: Hosted by a third party (family, friend, other)
Form.housing_autre_placeholder: Tell us your Current Residential Situation
Form.professional_situation_desc: For each adult occupying the property, please provide the following information:
Form.important_information_title: Important Notes – Reservation Fee & Final Inspection
Form.reservation_commission_description: To reserve the property, a fee equivalent to 50% of the monthly rent (excl. VAT) must be paid prior to drafting the lease.
Form.reservation_commission_point1: This amount secures priority reservation and holds the property during contract preparation.
Form.reservation_commission_point2: If a fundamental contractual disagreement arises before signing, this fee is fully refundable.
Form.reservation_commission_point3: If the applicant withdraws unilaterally after oral/written acceptance, the fee may be retained as compensation.
Form.reservation_commission_note: This fee is not a deposit but an agency commission for reservation.
Form.exit_condition_report_description: A mandatory professional inspection at the end of the lease will be conducted:
Form.exit_condition_report_point2: Purpose: ensure fair, impartial, and documented return condition of the property
Form.rgpd_desc: In accordance with Articles 12 to 21 of the GDPR, you have the following rights:
Form.rgpd_list_7: Lodge a complaint with CNPD Luxembourg:
Form.first_name_error: First name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
Form.last_name_error: Last name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
Form.submit_success: You’ve finished filling out all the forms!
Form.submit_success2: We’ll reach out to you as soon as possible.
Form.submit_error: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again.
Form.min_error: The minimum value must be greater than or equal to
Form.max_error: The maximum value must be less than or equal to
Form.signature_required_error: Please sign the signature of the main applicant.
Form.data_save_error: Data save error, please try again
